website_summaries.verdict: In spite of some known flaws, it's worth considering if you have major chipping to do.
pros: Extremely powerful with a solid, gas-powered Kohler engine
Stable wheels and a convenient collection bag
Handles branches up to 3 inches in diameter
cons: not for average users with small jobs

customer_reviews.title: broke on second use
customer_reviews.text: We used this twice and it broke the second time. we called customer service but they said the warranty was up because it had been more than 30 days (we didn't use it for the first 30 days). They said the warranty only covers the motor and its the blade that is jammed and not working. I can't believe we spend this much money to use it twice (well one and a half times since it broke during the second use).
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t even think about it.  The other reviewers must work for the company.
customer_reviews.text: It took a real genius to place the oil fill in an inaccessible position. And a nitwit to contrive bolting the knuckle busting task of bolting the rubber flapper onto the leaf hopper? The instructions are insufficient. What in hell is a combination choke and throttle and how does it work? The directions don’t say. Finally after screwing with it for two days, the damned thing won’t start. I would love to throttle the stooges who contrived this ripoff.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Bax

customer_reviews.title: Nice item for certain size projects.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe my expectations where to high. It arrived with a damaged hopper but they where super great about handling that. And that was on the shipper not them. 5 stars for customer service. And it does basically what they say. Just alot more work on my part than I had hoped for. For small projects I'm sure its awesome. But with a couple acres a small project isn't what I have. Don't get me wrong, its a good product for the right project.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Landis

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and clean.
customer_reviews.text: This wood chipper made very short work of my large pile of tree trimming. The bag is a nice feature. It would fill up rather quick but was easy to remove, spread the chips around tree trunks, then place it back on and keep chipping. It was very nice not to have to clean up afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Liph

customer_reviews.title: Earthquake Chipper Shredder 22754
customer_reviews.text: This machine works great. The only problem with the machine is when you change the oil. Vary hard to do. Need a longer funnel. I went out and got a small plastic hose to fit over the end of the funnel. As far as the machine itself This is a great machine for small limbs up to 2". I went through 2 or three pine trees branches in no time at all. Robert
customer_reviews.author: R Lamore

customer_reviews.title: Earth Quake Tazz K52 Kohler Engine
customer_reviews.text: Ever Watch Taz (Looney Tunes) Tasmanian Devil, commonly referred to as Taz,, on the Saturday morning cartoons This is The Tazz with 2 z's. Works Great on Leaves. I used the hose attachment on a 15 x 10 x 4 feet tall pile of wet and dry leaves in about 3 hours and this shredder did very well about 7 bags full The Fine mulch will be used by me. 20 to 1 is true. Thanks Earthquake, I made the right choice..
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Works great and the Kohler engine is the way to go
customer_reviews.text: Works great and the Kohler engine is the way to go. I ordered the optional leaf attachment which was worthless. Well made machine but has it's limits. Great for small to medium jobs and that's what I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Norman P. Rounds

customer_reviews.title: Green chipper
customer_reviews.text: I really like this chipper But its really noisy so get yourself some earmuffs/earplugs Branch chipper doesn't stay sharp, could be better.... Otherwise it's tough as nails Great for composting
customer_reviews.author: deliberate

customer_reviews.title: Smashed Part!
customer_reviews.text: It came with the Hopper flange smashed! I would like to a get a new hopper NOT send the whole machine(almost assembled) back! i have the oil added and it is ready to go except for the Hopper. It is not like sending a Movie or book back!! It weighs a 121 LBS !
customer_reviews.author: Neil S.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The shredder started up just fine. From there it all went down hill. The first 2 inch branch clogged the machine. Had to dissemble the housing to unclog the machine. Started it back up and didn't even start the first branch that had clogged the machine in the first place and the engine froze up. Very unhappy :o( JUNK!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: pbear

customer_reviews.title: Bent part
customer_reviews.text: Part of the chute arrived bent and had to be hammered into place in order to assemble product & because of this one screw was unable to be inserted. All of this made assembly more time consuming
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Chips, shreds wet or dry materials. No jams, no build up of material when shredding green waste. Only down sides: 1) zipper on collection bag jams easily with shredded material; 2) direct drive engine with no clutch makes starting a bit difficult, due to having to rotate the entire mass of the chipper / shredder with each pull. Still, a good machine at a reasonable price...
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J. Stein

customer_reviews.title: This monster eats everything I feed I and asks for more!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this cellulose scarfing monster! I’ve put enough junk trees through this thing to fill a pickup to the brim with mulch. Bought a harbor freight chipper first, broke the main shaft on the second day. This monster devours what the HF choked on. Well worth the value.
customer_reviews.author: chris martindale

customer_reviews.title: Badly damaged
customer_reviews.text: The product was badly damaged so I was unable to use it . UPS has thus far been very uncooperative in the return. All very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Geurin

customer_reviews.title: Would not purchase this model again.
customer_reviews.text: Cannot chip anything larger than a quarter, either green or dry. Definately not a chipper, leaf shredder maybe. Damage to chipper upon receipt. Bent axel and hopper was also bent.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Fill oil before installing the chute!
customer_reviews.text: Filling the engine oil was very difficult. There is limited access. I really like the machine otherwise. The mulch is very fine and consistent.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D

customer_reviews.title: Delivery not good damage
customer_reviews.text: The order shows up late and box broke and motor too
customer_reviews.author: kenny chin

customer_reviews.title: See video. Thought the first one was defective and ...
customer_reviews.text: See video. Thought the first one was defective and did the return thing. 2nd does not work either. See video
customer_reviews.author: Bobby L. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Kohler makes a very good engine
customer_reviews.text: Started right away. Works great. Kohler makes a very good engine.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Jones

customer_reviews.title: very poor
customer_reviews.text: unable to start . Nothing instructing on how to start. very poor design
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: what I don/t like is this item is the second time that I received something shipped by a certain carrier that goes thru Goldsboro NC . it had the same problem box wet and had several large holes . I went to hardware store again to get nuts (hardware missing) and bolts to assemble the item. I ponded out several dents so I could assemble. I do like that I can go on line to see assembly procedure. once the machine is assembled you will love it. I used it for several hours and no problem but you must remember do not jam branches go slow and easy and it will run smooth with very little hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: junction

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: A couple of general comments. First the chipper is rock solid construction. All comments about problematic location of oil fill are accurate, i used a rubber extension attached to a funnel. I bought the chipper primarily to get rid of leaves- it reduced several tarp loads to small piles- surpassed my expectations. It easily took care of small branches in the yard. Another reviewer discussed the safety strips at the top of the hopper as being an impediment. Removal is difficult due to location of nuts/bolts- i used a bungycord attached to the handle to lift the strips- took 2 minutes and the shield is still attached.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging, design and quality control
customer_reviews.text: Good price point. Poor quality and design. Bent hopper flange, scraped up handle, bad axle weld causes wheel to toe in and rub against chipper housing, difficult to pull oil plug, shute too close to engine. Do your homework before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mike V

customer_reviews.title: Whomever designed this hates people
customer_reviews.text: I bought one from Home Depot and I kind of hate it. The branch funnel blocks the oil fill, and if something jams it, as happened to me, there's no easy way to clear it. I'm going to have to remove the engine tomorrow to open this thing. Maybe they could have made the lower half of the knife shroud removable? No, not even a little bit. Had I known how badly it was designed I would have never bought it.
customer_reviews.author: That Guy

product_meta.title: Tazz 22754 K52 Chipper Shredder - 196cc 4-Cycle Kohler Engine
product_meta.description: The K52 Tazi Chipper Shredder offers incredible performance in a surprisingly compact package. The unit is powered by an easy-starting and powerful Kohler engine, strong enough to chip branches up to 3" in diameter. The rugged steel hopper stands at only 34" high, so yard waste can be dropped in with minimal effort while larger branches can be fed into the limb chute. If desired, mulch can be collected in the included debris bag. The grinding chamber features heavy-duty knives and hammers that will reduce material down to 1/20th of its original volume. Each model has been tested to and surpassed, ANSI B71.6 safety standards. Experience the efficient power of Tazi Chipper Shredders today.
feature_bullets: 196cc Kohler engine with a 2-year warranty; Always-ready, 11" wheels will never go flat
Optional vacuum kit featuring a unique air gate and largest-in-class rotor, Tazz produces 20% more vacuum than similar chipper shredders
At a convenient 25.4" wide by 29.9" long, it takes up minimal room in your garage or shed
Rugged easy-to-use debris bag featuring the Bottom-Out zipper and a quick Dock-and-Lock bag connector
5 year warranty on product if it was purchased on or after 3/15/2017

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
